text: John McEnroe (born February 16, 1959) is an American retired tennis player. He became a professional in 1978. From 1986 to 1994, he was married to actress Tatum O'Neal. He grew up in Douglaston, Queens, New York City. He is thought of as one of the best tennis players of all time. He was once ranked number 1 in the world. He won three times at Wimbledon and four times at the U.S. Open. He is remembered for getting angry at the umpire very easily and his rivalries with players such Bj√∂rn Borg. He is probably also famous for his "You cannot be serious!" rant directed to an umpire in 1981 at Wimbledon. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:American game show hosts Category:American tennis players Category:American television talk show hosts Category:French Open champions Category:Living people Category:People from Wiesbaden Category:US Open (tennis) champions Category:Wimbledon champions Category:World No. 1 tennis players
title: John McEnroe
